channel.title: Photography on MareNostrum
channel.description: Recent content in Photography on MareNostrum

item.title: Gratitude
item.description: Gratitude Ey Nesimi, can Nesimi ol gani mihman iken Yarin sefaatlarim Ahmedi Muhtar iken Cumlenin rizkini veren ol gani serdar iken Yeryuzunun halifesi hunkara minnet eylemem Nesimi

item.title: Renegade
item.description: Renegade Seyh Bedrettin Destani Bedreddin bakti kemerlerden disari. Disarda gunes var. Yesermis avluda bir agacin dallari, ve bir akar suyla oyulmaktadir taslar. Bedreddin gulumsedi. Aydinlandi ici gozlerinin, dedi: - Madem ki bu kerre maglubuz netsek, neylesek zaid. Gayri uzatman sozu. Mademki fetva bize aid verin ki basak bagrina muhrumuzu.. Nazim Hikmet

item.title: If We Pay Attention...
item.description: If We Pay Attention Bakarsak Zarif bir hüzündür bembeyaz dolaşan kuğuya bakarsak Mücevher titreşimleriyle mütereddit bir akşam suya bakarsak Fazlasıyla ısındı deniz kaynadı kaynayacak Dipten bir deprem yaklaşıyor suyun üzerindeki buğuya bakarsak Ne kadar yoksul ve çıplak görünürse görünsün ağaçlar O kadar yakındır ilkbahar özsuyu yürümüş dallara uğultuyla bakarsak Attila Ilhan

item.title: The Discreet Shadow
item.description: All previous crimes of the Russian empire… The Unbearable Lightness of Being, Milan Kundera

item.title: The Wild Fire
item.description: bir yangın ormanından püskürmüş genç fidanlardı Attila Ilhan

item.title: Istanbul Will Appear if You Get Out of My Way
item.description: Istanbul will appear if you get out of my way Attila Ilhan

item.title: I Have No Mission
item.description: I have no mission. No one has. The Unbearable Lightness of Being, Milan Kundera

item.title: Let the Ships Sail Without You
item.description: Let the ships sail without you Attila Ilhan

item.title: If I Died I Would Die Perfectly
item.description: If I died I would die perfectly Attila Ilhan

item.title: When the Heart Speaks
item.description: When the heart speaks, the mind finds it indecent to object. The Unbearable Lightness of Being, Milan Kundera

item.title: Don't Regret Anything in Life
item.description: Don’t regret anything in life. If it’s good, it’s wonderful. If it’s bad, it’s experience! When you win, you win. When you lose, you learn. Richard Phillips Feynman

item.title: Those Who Died Where They Were Born
item.description: Those who died where they were born… Zulfu Livaneli

item.title: Not Even Your Own
item.description: No heart can ever be truly understood. Not even your own. Red Queen, Victoria Aveyard

item.title: Because of You
item.description: If this city is beautiful, it’s because of you. Nazım Hikmet

item.title: A Wall Never Seen the Sun
item.description: I’m a wall that never seen the sun You’re another one that never seen the sun Wall, Attila Ihan

item.title: Words Without Letters
item.description: Words without letters Standing in the shadow of the doors 1Q84, Haruki Muarakami
